about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Endless Nights - Zombie Apocalypse, where you face well you guessed it - "Endless Nights" of thrilling, challenging, intense tests of survival through carnage that just wont quit! See if you have what it takes to be the Elite Survivor, the Primal Warrior, the best ENZA SOLDIER!

In this epic AAA quality 3rd person Zombie Shooter, it's not about just surviving from the dead- but from surviving battles against other living factions out there too! No camping in this game, you will be constantly hunted by several different types of the dead - "Land and Air!" Be sure to keep you sight on a swivel and trigger finger ready in this action packed one of a kind game mode!

Endless Nights - Zombie Apocalypse Features many different game modes:

- 1v1 Deathmatch/Objective
- 4v4 Deathmatch/Objective
- 100 Player Battle Royale
- Ranked Tournaments

Some Additional Game Features Coming Soon:

- Weapon Customization (Custom Saved Builds)
- Crafting System (Weapon Upgrades)
And more

name: Endless Nights - Zombie Apocalypse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 9
  • Processor: i7 CPU or Higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 550 GTX or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i9 CPU or Higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2090 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
